rules.natural: Either the player has low health or the player has low stamina.

rules.prover9_expression: (natural_place_accessible(player, healing_spring) | (-(technology_available(player, medkit) | technology_available(player, antidote)) -> technology_available(player, regeneration_potion)))
rules.natural: Either the player can access a healing spring or, if it is not the case that the player has access to a medkit or an antidote, then the player has access to a regeneration potion.
Provided that the player has access to night vision technology, the game is in the night cycle.
The player has access to night vision technology or the player has access to a torch.
Under the condition that the game has stormy weather, if the player has access to a torch then, whenever the digital survival game is not running, the player can access a safe cave.
The game has stormy weather or the game has clear weather.
If the game has clear weather, then having a torch implies that, if the digital survival game is not running, the player can access a safe cave.
Provided that the player has access to climbing gear, the player can access a mountain peak.
If the player has access to a flying device, then the digital survival game is running.
Whenever the player has low stamina, the digital survival game is running.
Under the condition that the player is at expert level, the player has access to climbing gear.
The player is at expert level or the player is at beginner level.

rules.prover9_expression: (condition_active(game, time_limit) | (-(condition_active(player, beginner_level) -> technology_available(player, flying_device)) -> natural_place_accessible(player, secret_garden)))
rules.natural: Either the game has a time limit active or, if it is not the case that the player being at beginner level implies access to a flying device, then the player can access a secret garden.
Provided that the player can access an ancient temple, the player has special powers.

rules.prover9_expression: (natural_place_accessible(player, ancient_temple) | (condition_active(game, survival_mode) -> (-(condition_active(player, low_health) -> game_running(digital_survival)) -> condition_active(player, poisoned))))
rules.natural: Either the player can access an ancient temple or, if the game is in survival mode then, whenever it is not the case that the player having low health implies the game is running, the player is poisoned.
Under the condition that the player has access to PvP weapons, the player can access an arena.
The player has access to PvP weapons or the player has access to team gear.

rules.prover9_expression: (technology_available(player, team_gear) -> (condition_active(game, multiplayer) -> (-(technology_available(player, torch) -> (-game_running(digital_survival) -> natural_place_accessible(player, safe_cave))) -> -technology_available(player, umbrella))))
rules.natural: Whenever the player has access to team gear, then if the game is in multiplayer mode, the failure of the torch implying non-running game leads to safe cave access results in no umbrella for the player.

rules.prover9_expression: (technology_available(player, map) -> (-(condition_active(game, quest_active) -> (-(technology_available(player, climbing_gear) | technology_available(player, flying_device)) -> natural_place_accessible(player, base_camp))) -> natural_place_accessible(player, treasure_vault)))
rules.natural: Provided that the player has access to a map, then, if it is not the case that an active quest implies that lacking climbing gear or a flying device leads to base camp access, the player can access a treasure vault.
The player has access to a map or the player has access to a compass.

rules.prover9_expression: (technology_available(player, compass) -> (-(condition_active(game, quest_active) -> (-(technology_available(player, climbing_gear) | technology_available(player, flying_device)) -> natural_place_accessible(player, base_camp))) -> natural_place_accessible(player, treasure_vault)))
rules.natural: If the player has access to a compass, then, if the active quest not implying that lacking climbing gear or flying device gives base camp access holds, the player can access a treasure vault.
The game is in survival mode or the game is in creative mode.
If the game is in creative mode, then, if it is not the case that low health implies the game is running, the player is poisoned.
Whenever the player has access to a medkit, the game is in hardcore mode.

rules.prover9_expression: (technology_available(player, antidote) -> (condition_active(game, survival_mode) -> (-(condition_active(player, low_health) -> game_running(digital_survival)) -> condition_active(player, poisoned))))
rules.natural: Provided that the player has access to an antidote, then if the game is in survival mode, the absence of low health implying game running leads to the player being poisoned.
If it is not the case that having a torch implies that non-running game gives safe cave access, then the player has access to an umbrella.
If it is not the case that the player being at beginner level implies access to a flying device, then the player cannot access a secret garden.

rules.prover9_expression: (-(condition_active(game, quest_active) -> (-(technology_available(player, climbing_gear) | technology_available(player, flying_device)) -> natural_place_accessible(player, base_camp))) -> -natural_place_accessible(player, treasure_vault))
rules.natural: If it is not the case that an active quest implies that lacking climbing gear or flying device leads to base camp access, then the player cannot access a treasure vault.
If the digital survival game is not running, then the player cannot access a safe cave.
